participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, Emily often finds solace in her knitting and enjoys the company of her dogs.
participant_1.background: i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion. i've a dogs. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, James thrives in open relationships and enjoys spending time with his dogs.
participant_2.background: i've three dogs. my father was a door to door salesman. i like to watch the olympics. i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business.
